message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you won't find a better offer anywhere else.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a price of $8500 for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to sell it to you for $8500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $9000. It's still a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.

I understand your position, Alice. I've done some research and found similar products at lower prices. I would like to propose a price of $8750 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still confident that this product is worth the investment. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $8800. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal.

Thank you for considering my previous offers, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After further consideration, I would like to propose a final price of $8600 for the product. I hope this aligns with your valuation of the item.
